title: Dr Seuss: how Grinch stole Christmas
brief_description: Dr. Seuss’s famous story. The nasty Grinch decides to stop Christmas from coming to the town of Who-Ville by stealing all the Christmas presents that Santa has just delivered, only to discover the true meaning of Christmas is not about presents. Narrated by Boris Karloff. Also features ‘Horton Hears a Who’.
